summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3551, for the improvement of Findlay Street and Lucile Street, each from 42nd Avenue South to 46th Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43868, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
